p: The method of Noshad et al. ( 2018) was used to evaluate the antibacterial effect of the CEO against some pathogenic gram‐positive bacteria ( Staphylococcus aureus, Listeria innocua, and Bacillus cereus) and gram‐negative bacteria ( Escherichia coli, Pseudomonas aeruginosa, and Salmonella typhi), through disk diffusion agar (DDA), well diffusion agar (WDA), and minimum inhibitory/bactericidal concentration (MIC/MBC) methods.
